# Send Postcards to Contacts Automatically using CentralStationCRM and EchtPost

In this workflow, you send a **postcard** to a person newly created in CentralStationCRM.

* the workflow is triggered when a person is updated in the CRM
* the blue set node filters the data required for EchtPost
* the green if node checks whether the word “EchtPost” appears in the tags
* if yes, a card is sent via the EchtPost API






*To edit the nodes in steps 2 and 5: Simply double-click!*

*At the very end: Set the workflow switch to Active!*

*Don't forget to save your work!*

## 3. get EchtPost API key
* Log in to EchtPost
* Click on the cogwheel at the top right
![API EchtPost](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/Echt_Post_API_Schluessel_24d1c6be44.png)
* Click on "Create API key
* Enter description (e.g. "n8n")
* Copy API key

## 4. get EchtPost template ID
![EchtPost Navbar](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/Echt_Post_Vorlagen_1592063ee7.png)
* Click on the desired template
* Copy the number after ?template_id= in the URL

## 5. Configure EchtPost API Node
* Double-click node
* METHOD: POST
* https://api.echtpost.de/v1/cards
* Authentication: none
* SEND BODY: True
* Body Content Type: JSON
* Specify Body: Using JSON

JSON Code (Important: Switch to "Expression"!)
* Replace key, template ID and mail with your own values


{
 "apikey": "ENTER HERE-API-KEY",
 "card": {
 "template_id": "HERE-TEMPLATE-ID",
 "deliver_at": "3-days-from-now", "
 " "notification_type": "before_send",
 "notification_email": "YOUR EMAIL",
 "contacts_attributes": [
 {
 "company_name": "{{ $json.body.record.companies[0].name }}",
 "street": "{{ $json.body.record.addrs[0].street }}",
 "zip": "{{ $json.body.record.addrs[0].zip }}", "
 city": "{{ $json.body.record.addrs[0].city }}", "
 country_code": "{{ $json.body.record.addrs[0].country_code }}"
      }
    ]
  }
}

## 2. set up CentralStationCRM Webhook
* log in to CentralStationCRM
* click on the gear wheel at the top right

![Account settings](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/CSCRM_Settings_edb73dede7.jpg)
![Webhook](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/CSCRM_Settings_Webhook_0b20350753.jpg)
* click "Create webhook"
* enter password
* "Monitored object type": Person
* "Monitored event": Update
* for "Endpoint URL" enter webhook URL
* enter the following for "Nested objects":
tags, addrs, companies
* enter name and description (e.g. n8n Test)
* set status to active and save

## 2. Set up n8n webhook trigger
* double-click node
* HTTP Method: POST
* Authentication: none

### For testing: 
Tag a person in CentralStationCRM with "EchtPost" and click on "Listen for Test Event" on the node shortly beforehand. The webhook should be triggered and the data transferred to the node.

### For operation:
* Switch from "Test URL" to "Production URL"
* Copy new webhook URL (click on it)
* Enter new URL under "Endpoint URL" in the CentralStationCRM webhook created in step 2

### Tools in this workflow
* [CentralStationCRM](https://centralstationcrm.de) - the simple and intuitive CRM for small teams.
* [EchtPost](https://echtpost.de) - send postcards online

## 1. get webhook URL from n8n
* Double-click the first node in the workflow
* Click once on the url next to POST
